name: Ashfaq Nipun
description: Ashfaque Nipun is a Bangladeshi television director, screenwriter and actor known for directing Mohanagar, Mukim Brothers, Ei Shohore, Landphone er dingulite prem, Miss Shuily, Victim and Eti Maa.

name: Omitab Reza
description: Amitabh Reza Chowdhury (Bengali: অমিতাভ রেজা চৌধুরী) is a Bangladeshi filmmaker. In his career, he has directed nearly fifteen hundred (1500) television commercials (henceforth TVCs).

name: Mostofa Sarwar Farooki
description: Mostofa Sarwar Farooki (born 2 May 1973) is a Bangladeshi film director, producer and screenwriter. His films Third Person Singular Number, Television acclaimed across the world and received international and national awards.

name: Animash Aich
description: Animesh Aich (born 8 February)[2] is a Bangladeshi film maker, actor, director and writer.As of 2019, he directed three films and several television dramas.He is very active and intelligent and open mind. He is falxibale and Socail Activist.

name: Abul Hayat
description: Abul Hayat (born 7 September 1944)[1] is a Bangladeshi actor. He is also a writer, civil engineer and director.[2] He earned Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Supporting Actor for the film Daruchini Dwip and was awarded Ekushey Padak for his acting in 2015 by the Government of Bangladesh.

name: Redoan Rony
description: Redoan Rony is a national award-winning film director, and producer from Bangladesh.He has spent more than a decade in the media industry of Bangladesh. He has directed a few of the most popular TV series of Bangladesh e.g. Housefull, Fnf,Pata Jharar Din, etc
